Owned by the same wonderful folks at Cera 23, Arume, like its older sister is somewhat difficult to find. It well worth the search.  Again, outstanding service and food in a really fun location.  Wonderfully inexpensive for a quality and service and again, those blackberry mojitos were a delight.  We ordered the well reviewed paella as our mains and assorted appetizers to begin and loved everything.  What really makes this restaurant one step above is the outstanding service.  We even ended up talking with one of the partners (Andrew?) and he was as delightful as his staff.  Be sure to make reservations as here again, the place is packed but never feeling overcrowded.  A not to be missed dining experience and I don't believe we broke 60E for,the both of us.
